SQL_STMT_U.val: select a.DocEntry,b.ObjType,b.DocDate, c.CardName,a.Qty,b.TrackNo,a.ItemName,b.estDate from spk1 a (nolock) left join ocrd c (nolock) on c.CardCode=a.cardcode , ospk b (nolock) where a.cardcode=':1' and a.isSubcont='Y' and LineStatus='O' and b.DocEntry=a.DocEntry and b.DocStatus<'2' and b.BplId=:2 and b.TrackNo like '%:3%'
